asset.title: HSN | Nurberxo | Clipless Curling Iron
asset.description:
.
BEAUTY BASICS with Nurberxo | How To | Clipless Curling Iron

Shop HSN's Clipless Curling Irons at http://goo.gl/6iATVe
Shop HSN's finishing products at http://goo.gl/mJbYaA

STEP #1:
-No clamp = no dents
-Keep in mind the size and shape of the barrel

STEP #2:
-A smaller barrel means tighter curls
-A bigger barrel means bigger curls

STEP #3:
-Hold it downward towards the floor
-Bunch it up for a rope effect
-Wrap it like a ribbon for a smoother effect

STEP #4:
-Let your hair cool before you brush it
asset.author: HSN
